title: Abuja currently facing multiple traffic conjestion as major road construction begins
excerpt: Abuja, the bustling capital city of Nigeria, finds itself trapped in the relentless grip of traffic chaos as major road construction projects kick off. Residents and commuters alike are experiencing mounting frustration as the already congested roadways are further strained by the ongoing infrastructure development.
